name: ganesh.reddy
diet_plan:
**Andhra Pradesh Regional Diet Plan for Ganesh.reddy**

| Day | Meal Type | Meal Item | Portion Size | Calories | Proteins (g) | Carbs (g) | Fats (g) | Vitamins | Other Nutrients |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| **Monday** | Breakfast | Ragi dosa with green chutney | 2 dosas with 1 tbsp chutney | 250 | 9 | 45 | 5 | B1, B2, Iron | Calcium, Fiber |
| | Lunch | Chicken biryani with raita | 1 cup biryani with 1/2 cup raita | 500 | 30 | 60 | 20 | A, C, Calcium | Iron, Zinc |
| | Dinner | Gongura mutton curry with bajra roti | 1 bowl curry with 2 rotis | 400 | 40 | 45 | 15 | Vitamin C, Iron | Fiber, Calcium |
| | Snack | Banana | 1 medium banana | 120 | 1 | 27 | 0 | B6, Potassium | Magnesium |
| **Tuesday** | Breakfast | Idli with sambar and coconut chutney | 3 idlis with 1/2 cup sambar and 1 tbsp chutney | 280 | 10 | 50 | 6 | C, B9, Iron | Calcium, Fiber |
| | Lunch | Andhra chicken curry with steamed rice | 1 cup curry with 1 cup rice | 450 | 35 | 55 | 15 | A, B12, Copper | Iron, Zinc |
| | Dinner | Pesarattu with tomato chutney | 1 pesarattu with 1/4 cup chutney | 250 | 12 | 40 | 6 | Vitamin B1, C | Iron, Calcium |
| | Snack | Apple with peanut butter | 1 apple with 1 tbsp peanut butter | 250 | 5 | 25 | 15 | C, K, Fiber | Monounsaturated fat |
| **Wednesday** | Breakfast | Upma with mixed vegetables | 1 cup upma | 200 | 6 | 35 | 5 | A, C, Calcium | Iron, Fiber |
| | Lunch | Mutton pulao | 1 cup pulao | 400 | 25 | 50 | 15 | A, B12, Iron | Copper, Zinc |
| | Dinner | Gujarati kadhi with steamed rice | 1 bowl kadhi with 1 cup rice | 350 | 15 | 55 | 5 | Vitamin C, Iron | Calcium, Fiber |
| | Snack | Handful of almonds | 1 handful (approx. 10 almonds) | 180 | 6 | 6 | 15 | Vitamin E, Magnesium | Monounsaturated fat |
| **Thursday** | Breakfast | Poha with jaggery and coconut | 1 cup poha | 220 | 5 | 40 | 5 | B1, B2 | Iron, Fiber |
| | Lunch | Methi chicken with chapati | 1 cup curry with 2 chapatis | 420 | 30 | 52 | 12 | A, C, Iron | Calcium, Fiber |
| | Dinner | Dal fry with bajra roti | 1 bowl dal with 2 rotis | 380 | 35 | 40 | 10 | Vitamin B9, Iron | Calcium, Fiber |
| | Snack | Trail mix | 1/4 cup (mixture of nuts, seeds, and dried fruits) | 200 | 6 | 20 | 12 | A, C, E | Antioxidants |
| **Friday** | Breakfast | Oatmeal with berries and nuts | 1/2 cup oatmeal with 1/4 cup berries and 1/4 cup nuts | 250 | 8 | 45 | 5 | B1, B6, Iron | Antioxidants, Fiber |
| | Lunch | Chicken curry with brown rice | 1 cup curry with 1 cup rice | 450 | 35 | 55 | 15 | A, B12, Iron | Copper, Zinc |
| | Dinner | Vegetable biryani | 1 bowl biryani | 380 | 15 | 50 | 10 | A, C, Iron | Calcium, Fiber |
| | Snack | Banana with yogurt | 1 banana with 1 cup yogurt | 320 | 15 | 50 | 5 | B12, Potassium | Calcium, Protein |
| **Saturday** | Breakfast | Dosa with peanut chutney | 2 dosas with 1/2 cup chutney | 300 | 10 | 50 | 10 | B1, B2, Iron | Calcium, Fiber |
| | Lunch | Dal makhani with naan | 1 cup dal with 2 pieces naan | 500 | 30 | 70 | 15 | Vitamin B9, Iron | Calcium, Fiber |
| | Dinner | Paneer tikka masala with chapati | 1 bowl curry with 2 chapatis | 450 | 40 | 50 | 15 | A, C, Iron | Calcium, Fiber |
| | Snack | Apple with cheese | 1 apple with 1/4 cup cheese | 220 | 6 | 25 | 10 | A, C, K | Calcium, Protein |
| **Sunday** | Breakfast | Puri with aloo sabzi | 3 puris with 1 bowl aloo sabzi | 400 | 15 | 60 | 15 | A, C, Iron | Calcium, Fiber |
| | Lunch | Andhra fish curry with steamed rice | 1 cup curry with 1 cup rice | 480 | 40 | 50 | 18 | A, D, Iron | Calcium, Zinc |
| | Dinner | Chicken 65 with roti | 1 plate chicken 65 with 2 rotis | 500 | 45 | 55 | 20 | A, B12, Iron | Copper, Zinc |
| | Snack | Mango smoothie | 1 cup smoothie | 250 | 2 | 50 | 2 | A, C, Potassium | Fiber, Antioxidants |
